Class oracle.html.TableRow

Class oracle.html.TableRow 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.TableRow
public class TableRow
extends Item
Description:

The TableRow class abstracts a row of a table

Instructions:

Use this class together with Table[Data/Header]Cell, DynamicTable classes to create an HTML table.

Example: 

// Creates a new TableRow
TableRow row = new TableRow;
// Add TableDataCells to TableRow
 row
   .addCell(new TableDataCell(new SimpleItem("first cell")))
   .addCell(new TableDataCell(new SimpleItem("second cell")))
   .addCell(new TableDataCell(new SimpleItem("third cell")));

See Also:
Table, DynamicTable, StaticTable, TableHeaderCell, TableDataCell

TableRow()
Creates a new TableRow
TableRow(int)
Creates a new TableRow with initial Capacity of initCapacity
TableRow(int, int, int)
Creates a new TableRow with specified initial Capacity, horizontal alignment and vertical alignment

addCell(TableCell)
Add a cell to this TableRow
addCell(String)
Adds a new TableDataCell to this TableRow
Note: A convenience function
cellAt(int)
Returns the TableCell at specified position
cells()
Returns the number of cells in this TableRow
print()
Prints content of TableRow to System.out
setCellAt(int, SimpleItem)
Set the content of cell at the position specified by index
setIHAlign(int)
Set the default Horizontal Alignment Attribute for all cells in this row
setIVAlign(int)
Set the default Vertical Alignment Attribute for all cells in this row
toHTML()
Returns content of TableRow as HTML String
toString()
Returns content of TableRow as regular string
